title: How do i change region
body: pls help me i want to play with my midget friend pl0x

replies.body: Account transfers are turned off until Nov 20th for the end of season rewards and such, but when they come back up you can find it in the store under account options.
Are account transfers still turned off? I can't see the option, the only thing I see is the summoner name change.

Unfortunately, they are still having some issues fixing up account transfers. They aren't just turned off, otherwise, they would have been enabled on time when they were originally scheduled to be back up.

So is there an estimated time? 
If there is how do we find out when we are able to change regions?
Hopefully there is a quick fix found for this!
{{summoner:4}}
